info.title: Nursing App API Documentation
info.description:
API documentation for the Nursing App - A platform connecting users with nursing services.
 *     
 *     ðŸ”Œ **Real-time Communication**
 *     This API also supports WebSocket channels for real-time updates.
 *     See the 'Real-time Events' tag for event schemas.
 *     
 *     **WebSocket Channels:**
 *     - Chat: private-chat.{threadId}
 *     - Full documentation in routes/channels.php
 *     
 *     **Frontend Integration:**
 *     Subscribe to channels using Laravel Echo:
 *     Echo.private('chat.123').listen('MessageCreated', callback)
 *

get.description: Retrieve the about us information. Available to both users and admins.

description.example: We provide professional nursing care services

get.summary: List all users for notification targeting
get.description: Get a list of all users that admin can send notifications to
Retrieve all doctor availability slots, optionally filtered by doctor_id.

end_time.description: Time in HH:mm format, must be after start_time

post.description: Update an availability slot. Use POST with _method=PUT. All fields are optional. If is_booked is set to false, clears booked_request_id.

delete.description: Delete an availability slot. Cannot delete if slot is booked.

locale.description: Translation locale (optional, defaults to 'en' if not provided)

post.description: Update a doctor category. Use POST with _method=PUT for file uploads. All fields are optional.

locale.description: Translation locale (optional, defaults to 'en' if not provided)

post.description: Create a new doctor with translations and area-based pricing. If area_prices is not provided, automatically creates pricing for all areas using the base price.

price.description: Base price (used for all areas if area_prices not provided)

locale.description: Translation locale (optional, defaults to 'en' if not provided)

area_prices.description: Optional: Array of area-specific prices. If not provided, creates prices for all areas using base price.

post.description: Update a doctor. Use POST with _method=PUT for file uploads. All fields are optional. If area_prices is provided, replaces all existing area prices.

locale.description: Translation locale (optional, defaults to 'en' if not provided)

area_prices.description: Optional: Array of area-specific prices. Replaces all existing area prices.

get.summary: List all doctor operation area prices
get.description: Retrieve all doctor operation area prices, optionally filtered by operation_id.

post.summary: Create a new doctor operation area price

get.description: Retrieve all doctor operations, optionally filtered by doctor_id.

post.description: Create a new doctor reserved operation with translations and area-based pricing. If area_prices is not provided, automatically creates pricing for all areas using the base price.

price.description: Base price (used for all areas if area_prices not provided)

locale.description: Translation locale (optional, defaults to 'en' if not provided)

area_prices.description: Optional: Array of area-specific prices. If not provided, creates prices for all areas using base price.

post.description: Update a doctor operation. Use POST with _method=PUT for file uploads. All fields are optional. If area_prices is provided, replaces all existing area prices.

locale.description: Translation locale (optional, defaults to 'en' if not provided)

area_prices.description: Optional: Array of area-specific prices. Replaces all existing area prices.

price.description: Test price (same for all areas)

get.description: Retrieve a specific test with translations

about_test.description: Translation based on Accept-Language header (falls back to 'en')

instructions.description: Translation based on Accept-Language header (falls back to 'en')

put.description: Update an existing test with image upload and translations. **CRITICAL FOR FILE UPLOADS:** This endpoint accepts both PUT (for non-file updates) and POST with `_method=PUT` (for file uploads). When uploading files, you MUST: 1) Use POST method (not PUT), 2) Include `_method=PUT` in form-data, 3) Use multipart/form-data. This is Laravel's method spoofing - required because PHP only populates \$_FILES for POST requests.

_method.description: **REQUIRED when using POST for file uploads:** Set this field to 'PUT' when using POST method. This enables Laravel method spoofing. Omit this field if using actual PUT request (without file uploads).

locale.description: Translation locale (optional, defaults to 'en' if not provided)

about_test.description: Translation based on Accept-Language header (falls back to 'en')

instructions.description: Translation based on Accept-Language header (falls back to 'en')

delete.description: Delete a test and its associated image and translations

instructions.description: Translation based on Accept-Language header (falls back to 'en')

price.description: Package price (same for all areas)

locale.description: Translation locale (optional, defaults to 'en' if not provided)

test_ids.description: Array of test IDs to include in package

get.description: Retrieve a specific test package with tests and translations

about_test.description: Translation based on Accept-Language header (falls back to 'en')

instructions.description: Translation based on Accept-Language header (falls back to 'en')

put.description: Update an existing test package with image, translations, and test relationships. **CRITICAL FOR FILE UPLOADS:** This endpoint accepts both PUT (for non-file updates) and POST with `_method=PUT` (for file uploads). When uploading files, you MUST: 1) Use POST method (not PUT), 2) Include `_method=PUT` in form-data, 3) Use multipart/form-data. This is Laravel's method spoofing - required because PHP only populates \$_FILES for POST requests.

_method.description: **REQUIRED when using POST for file uploads:** Set this field to 'PUT' when using POST method. This enables Laravel method spoofing. Omit this field if using actual PUT request (without file uploads).

locale.description: Translation locale (optional, defaults to 'en' if not provided)

about_test.description: Translation based on Accept-Language header (falls back to 'en')

instructions.description: Translation based on Accept-Language header (falls back to 'en')

delete.description: Delete a test package and its associated image and translations

post.description: Update a trusted image. Use POST with _method=PUT for file uploads.

get.summary: Get user's request history with filtering (Admin)
get.description: View all requests for a specific user to help admin decide on discount application. Shows total sessions and spending to help with discount decisions. Supports filtering by status and insurance requests.

parameters.name: request_with_insurance
parameters.description: Filter by insurance requests (true/false). Only applies to Category 2 (Tests) requests.

thread_id.description: Chat thread ID for admin-user communication

get.summary: Get active popup for app launch
get.description: Retrieve the currently active popup for app opening. Returns the most recent active popup where start_date is null or <= now, end_date is null or > now, and is_active = true. Accessible to both users and admins.

200.description: Active popup retrieved successfully or no active popup available

image.description: Firebase Storage URL for popup image

content.example: We are excited to announce our new features...

get.description: Retrieve all active sliders ordered by position for homepage display. Accessible to both users and admins.

image.description: Firebase Storage URL for slider image

get.description: Generate a JWT token for Stream.io chat authentication. This token is required by the Flutter frontend to connect to Stream.io chat services. The token contains the user ID and is signed with the Stream.io API secret.

api_key.description: Stream.io API key for frontend connection

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Token generation failed

put.description: Update an existing user's profile information in Stream.io chat system. This is typically called when a user updates their profile information.

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to update user in Stream.io

error.example: Failed to update user in Stream.io

post.description: Create a new user profile in Stream.io chat system. This is typically called after user registration to ensure the user exists in both Laravel and Stream.io systems.

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to create user in Stream.io

error.example: Failed to create user in Stream.io

post.description: Create a new chat channel in Stream.io. This is typically used for creating group chats, support channels, or any other type of messaging channel.

channel_type.description: Type of channel (e.g., messaging, livestream, team, etc.)

members.description: Array of user IDs to add as members

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to create channel in Stream.io

error.example: Failed to create channel in Stream.io

post.description: Add one or more users to an existing Stream.io channel. This is useful for inviting users to group chats or adding new members to support channels.

members.description: Array of user IDs to add as members

message.example: Members added successfully to channel in Stream.io

data.description: Updated channel data with new members

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to add members to channel

error.example: Failed to add members to channel in Stream.io

post.description: Send a text message to a specific Stream.io channel. This is typically used for system-generated messages or automated notifications.

message.example: Hello! This is a system message.

parent_id.description: ID of parent message for replies

401.description: Unauthenticated - User must be logged in

500.description: Internal server error - Failed to send message

error.example: Failed to send message in Stream.io

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available areas for user registration and profile updates.

post.description: Register a new user with name, email, phone number, and password. Sends OTP via WhatsApp for verification.

birth_date.description: User's birth date (YYYY-MM-DD) - optional, used for birthday notifications

gender.description: User's gender - optional, one of: male, female, or none

area_id.description: User's area/region ID (required for region-based pricing)

message.example: User registered successfully. Please check your WhatsApp for the OTP.

error.example: Failed to send OTP. Please try again later.

post.description: Verify the OTP sent to user's phone number via WhatsApp/SMS
Authenticate user with email or phone number and password

email.description: User's email address or phone number

message.example: Your phone number is not verified.

post.description: Logout user and invalidate current token
Send OTP to user's phone number for password reset

message.example: OTP sent successfully. Please check your phone.
User with this phone number does not exist.
Failed to send OTP. Please try again later.

post.description: Reset user password using OTP verification
Resend OTP verification code to user's phone number

message.example: User with this phone number does not exist.
Failed to send OTP. Please try again later.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all categories. Available to both users and admins.

image_url.description: Firebase Storage URL for category image

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific category. Available to both users and admins.

image_url.description: Firebase Storage URL for category image

post.description: Create a new category with optional image. Only accessible by admins. If image upload fails, a 422 error is returned with a message.

422.description: Validation error or failed image upload

put.description: Update a category's information. Only accessible by admins.

delete.description: Delete a category from the system. Cannot delete if it has associated services. Only accessible by admins.

400.description: Cannot delete category with associated services

message.example: Cannot delete category with associated services.

post.summary: Open chat thread for service request
post.description: Opens a new chat thread for a service request or returns existing thread. Only the request owner or an admin can open a chat thread. Creates a temporary communication channel for real-time messaging during service delivery.

get.description: Retrieves paginated messages from a chat thread. Messages are ordered by ID descending (newest first) and support cursor-based pagination for efficient loading of large conversation histories.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of messages per page (max 50, default 20)

nextCursor.description: Next cursor for pagination (null if no more messages)

post.summary: Post new message to chat thread
post.description: Posts a new message to a chat thread. Supports three message types: text, image, and location. For image messages, mediaPath must be a valid storage path. For location messages, lat and lng coordinates are required. Messages trigger real-time broadcasting to thread participants.

422.description: Validation error - Invalid message data or media path

post.summary: Get signed URL for image upload
post.description: Retrieves a signed URL for uploading an image directly to storage. The client uses this URL to upload the image, then sends the mediaPath when posting the message.

filename.description: Original filename (used for generating unique storage path)

mediaPath.description: Storage path to use when posting the message

headers.description: HTTP headers to use during upload

422.description: Validation error - Invalid content type or missing parameters

patch.summary: Close chat thread and trigger cleanup
patch.description: Closes a chat thread and triggers automatic cleanup of messages and media. Once closed, no new messages can be posted. Background job processes media deletion and optional message redaction based on configuration.

post.description: Submit a contact form with user information and problem description. Authentication required.

description.description: Description of the problem or inquiry
description.example: I need nursing care for my elderly mother
I need nursing care for my elderly mother

get.description: Retrieve all doctor categories with translations. Returns category name and image based on Accept-Language header (defaults to 'en').
Retrieve details of a specific doctor category with translations.

get.summary: Get doctors by category and area
get.description: Retrieve all doctors in a specific category, optionally filtered by area. Returns area-specific pricing if area_id is provided, otherwise returns base price. All fields are translated based on Accept-Language header.

price.description: Area-specific price if area_id provided, otherwise base price

get.summary: Get doctor details with operations and availabilities
get.description: Retrieve complete doctor details including operations, availability slots (filtered by week if provided), and area-specific pricing. Availability slots are filtered to show only unbooked slots. All fields are translated based on Accept-Language header.

price.description: Area-specific price if area_id provided

items.description: Only unbooked slots are returned, filtered by week_start/week_end if provided

get.description: Retrieve a specific offer with translations and area-based pricing

get.summary: Get all offers for a specific area with pricing
get.description: Retrieve all offers available in a specific area with area-specific pricing when available, fallback to base prices when area pricing doesn't exist. Content is translated based on Accept-Language header.
Retrieve all physio machines available for Category 5 requests
Retrieve a specific physio machine
Retrieve all physiotherapists with translations and area-based pricing based on Accept-Language header

price.description: Price for user's area (or base price)

area_prices.description: All area prices for this physiotherapist

get.description: Retrieve a specific physiotherapist with translations and area-based pricing

get.summary: Get all physiotherapists for a specific area with pricing
get.description: Retrieve all physiotherapists available in a specific area with area-specific pricing when available, fallback to base prices when area pricing doesn't exist. Content is translated based on Accept-Language header.
Retrieve all rays with translations based on Accept-Language header

get.summary: Get all rays for a specific area with pricing
get.description: Retrieve all rays available in a specific area with area-specific pricing when available, fallback to base prices when area pricing doesn't exist. Content is translated based on Accept-Language header.

price.description: Area-specific price if available, otherwise base price

has_area_pricing.description: Whether this ray has area-specific pricing

get.summary: List all requests with 4-stage tracking and filtering
get.description: Retrieve all requests with comprehensive order tracking. Users see only their own requests, admins see all requests. Supports filtering by status and insurance requests. Latitude/longitude come from user location info, time_needed_to_arrive is cached and decreases over time.

parameters.name: request_with_insurance
parameters.description: Filter by insurance requests (true/false). Only applies to Category 2 (Tests) requests.

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

status.description: 4-stage order tracking: submitted â†’ assigned â†’ in_progress â†’ completed

latitude.description: From user location info, not stored in requests table

longitude.description: From user location info, not stored in requests table

time_needed_to_arrive.description: Cached time in minutes, decreases over time, auto-updates status to in_progress when reaches 0

thread_id.description: Chat thread ID for admin-user communication

total_price.description: Price calculated based on request area

post.summary: Create a new request or multiple requests
post.description: Create one or multiple service requests. Supports multiple categories with different payloads. Can accept either: 1) A single request object (multipart/form-data or JSON), or 2) An array of request objects (JSON only). For single requests with file uploads, use multipart/form-data. For multiple requests or JSON-only single requests, use application/json. Only accessible by users.

requestBody.description: For single request: Use multipart/form-data (for file uploads) or application/json. For multiple requests: Use application/json with an array of request objects. Required fields vary by category_id. Boolean values should be sent as strings: 'true' or 'false'.

schema.title: Create Request - All Categories
schema.description: Common fields for all categories. Category-specific required fields are listed below.

category_id.description: REQUIRED: Category ID (1=Service Request, 2=Tests, 3=Rays, 4=Machines, 5=Physiotherapist, 6=Offers, 7=Duties, 8=Doctors). Defaults to 1 if not provided.

machine_id.description: REQUIRED for Category 4 only: Machine ID

from_date.description: Optional for Category 4 only: Rental start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

to_date.description: Optional for Category 4 only: Rental end date (YYYY-MM-DD, must be after from_date)

full_name.description: Optional: Full name (can be built from first_name + last_name)

problem_description.description: Optional: Description of the problem/care needed
problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

additional_information.description: Optional additional information for all categories

use_saved_address.description: Flag to use saved user address. Send as string: 'true' or 'false'. If 'false', address fields are required for Category 1.

address_city.description: City (required for Category 1 if use_saved_address is false, optional for other categories)

address_street.description: Street address (required for Category 1 if use_saved_address is false, optional for other categories)

service_id.description: REQUIRED for Category 1 only: Single service ID

area_id.description: Optional for Category 1: Area ID for region-specific pricing. If not provided, uses user's registered area

time_type.description: Optional for Category 1: Type of time commitment needed

scheduled_time.description: Optional for Category 1: For immediate requests: use now(). For scheduled: use future time

ending_time.description: Optional for Category 1: Required only for scheduled appointments (not immediate requests)

test_package_id.description: REQUIRED for Category 2: Test package ID

request_details_files[].description: Optional for Category 2: Array of files (PDF, JPG, PNG, max 5MB each) - x-rays, prescriptions, lab reports

request_with_insurance.description: Optional for Category 2: Request with insurance option. Send as string: 'true' or 'false'

attach_front_face.description: Optional for Category 2: Insurance card front face (PDF, JPG, PNG, max 5MB) - Required if request_with_insurance is 'true'

attach_back_face.description: Optional for Category 2: Insurance card back face (PDF, JPG, PNG, max 5MB) - Required if request_with_insurance is 'true'

sessions_per_month.description: REQUIRED for Category 5: Sessions per month

machines_included.description: Optional for Category 5: Whether machines are included (send as string)

physio_machines[].description: Optional for Category 5: Array of physio machine IDs

request_details.description: Optional for Category 5: Single PDF file (max 5MB)

nurse_visit_id.description: REQUIRED for Category 7 (Nurse Visits subcategory): Nurse visit ID

visits_per_day.description: REQUIRED with nurse_visit_id: visits per day (1-4)

duty_id.description: REQUIRED for Category 7 (Duties subcategory): Duty ID

duration_hours.description: REQUIRED with duty_id unless is_continuous_care=true. Allowed: 4,6,8,12,24

is_continuous_care.description: Category 7 (Duties): Continuous care (1 month). If true, duration_hours not required

is_day_shift.description: Category 7 (Duties/Babysitter): Day shift (true) or night shift (false)

babysitter_id.description: REQUIRED for Category 7 (Babysitter subcategory): Babysitter ID

slot_id.description: REQUIRED for Category 8: Availability slot ID

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

total_price.description: Price calculated based on selected area

get.summary: Get user's default area for request creation
get.description: Get the user's registered area to use as default in the request creation form. This allows the frontend to pre-select the user's area while still allowing them to change it.

get.summary: Get request details with order tracking
get.description: Retrieve details of a specific request with 4-stage order tracking. Users can only view their own requests, admins can view any request. Real-time time_needed_to_arrive countdown and automatic status progression.

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

time_needed_to_arrive.description: Live countdown in minutes, auto-triggers status change to in_progress when reaches 0

thread_id.description: Chat thread ID for admin-user communication

total_price.description: Price calculated based on request area

put.description: Update a request. Only accessible by admins.

full_name.description: Full name of the person needing care

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

time_needed_to_arrive.description: Time in minutes needed to arrive

problem_description.example: Need nursing care for elderly parent

delete.description: Soft delete a request. The request is removed from admin view but remains available to users. Only accessible by admins.

message.example: Request removed from admin view, but still available to users.

get.summary: List all services with area-based pricing and translations
get.description: Retrieve a list of all services with pricing based on user's area and content translated based on Accept-Language header. If user has an area assigned and area-specific pricing exists, shows area price and area name. Otherwise shows original price without area information.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language preference (en, ar) - affects service names

price.description: Area-specific price if user has area and pricing exists, otherwise original price

area_name.description: Area name (only included when showing area-specific pricing)

translation.description: Translation info (only included when translation exists)

post.description: Create a new service with image upload and translations. Use form-data (multipart/form-data) for file uploads. Only accessible by admins.

price.description: Service price

discount_price.description: Discounted price (must be less than regular price)

image.description: Service image file (jpg, png, webp, max 2MB)

locale.description: Translation locale (REQUIRED)

get.summary: Get a specific service with area-based pricing and translations
get.description: Retrieve a specific service with pricing based on user's area and content translated based on Accept-Language header.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language preference (en, ar) - affects service names

area_name.description: Area name (only included when showing area-specific pricing)

translation.description: Translation info (only included when translation exists)

put.description: Update a service's information with image upload and translations. **CRITICAL FOR FILE UPLOADS:** This endpoint accepts both PUT (for non-file updates) and POST with `_method=PUT` (for file uploads). When uploading files, you MUST: 1) Use POST method (not PUT), 2) Include `_method=PUT` in form-data, 3) Use multipart/form-data. This is Laravel's method spoofing - required because PHP only populates \$_FILES for POST requests. Only accessible by admins.

_method.description: **REQUIRED when using POST for file uploads:** Set this field to 'PUT' when using POST method. This enables Laravel method spoofing. Omit this field if using actual PUT request (without file uploads).

price.description: Service price

discount_price.description: Discounted price (must be less than regular price)

image.description: Service image file (jpg, png, webp, max 2MB) - optional, updates image if provided

locale.description: Translation locale (optional, defaults to 'en' if not provided)

delete.description: Delete a service from the system. Only accessible by admins.

get.summary: Get pricing quote for services in a specific area
get.description: Get pricing information for multiple services in a specific area. This allows users to preview pricing before creating a request.

get.summary: Get all services for a specific area with pricing and translations
get.description: Retrieve all services available in a specific area with area-specific pricing when available, fallback to base prices when area pricing doesn't exist. Content is translated based on Accept-Language header.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Language preference (en, ar) - affects service names

price.description: Area-specific price if available, otherwise base price

area_name.description: Area name (only included when showing area-specific pricing)

has_area_pricing.description: Whether this service has area-specific pricing

translation.description: Translation info (only included when translation exists)

description.example: Updated URL for job application redirect
Updated URL for job application redirect

get.description: Retrieve all tests with translations based on Accept-Language header
Retrieve a specific test with translations based on Accept-Language header
Retrieve all test packages with tests and translations based on Accept-Language header
Retrieve a specific test package with tests and translations based on Accept-Language header
Retrieve the authenticated user's profile information
Retrieve a specific user's details by ID. Only accessible by admins.

put.description: Update user profile information. Users can only update their own profile, admins can update any user.

birth_date.description: User's birth date (YYYY-MM-DD) - used for birthday notifications

area_id.description: User's area/region ID for region-based pricing

get.description: Retrieve user dashboard with active requests count, recent services, most requested services (manually selected by admin), suggested doctors (manually selected by admin), and trusted images (managed by admin). All data is automatically included.

most_requested_services.description: Most requested services manually selected by admin

suggested_doctors.description: Suggested doctors manually selected by admin from Category 8

post.summary: Submit user location on first login
post.description: Submit user's location coordinates on first login. Can only be called once per user.

get.description: Retrieve admin dashboard with system statistics
Retrieve a list of all users in the system. Only accessible by admins.

post.description: Create a new user account. Only accessible by admins.

birth_date.description: User's birth date (YYYY-MM-DD) - optional, used for birthday notifications

role_id.description: User role ID (optional, defaults to user)

delete.description: Delete a user account from the system. Only accessible by admins.

media_url.description: Signed URL for image messages (temporary access)

admin_id.description: Admin user ID (if admin opened thread)

mediaPath.description: Storage path for image (required for image messages, must belong to thread)
